aboutpara:
As an Software Engineer at Lowe's India, I develop web and mobile applications for the home improvement industry. I use Java, Microservices, React, JavaScript, Node, and other technologies to create scalable and user-friendly solutions that meet the needs and expectations of the customers. I have 1 year of experience in software engineering and a strong passion for learning new technologies and improving my skills.

I graduated from Nirma University in 2021 with a Bachelor of Technology degree in Electronics and Communication Engineering. During my studies, I also completed a full-stack developer course from Newton School, where I learned how to build end-to-end web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node. I enjoy working on personal projects and participating in hackathons, where I can apply my knowledge and creativity. Some of my recent projects include a mobile app that allows users to create and join local tournaments for various sports and games, a web app that lets users watch and react to the latest movies, and a personal website that showcases my resume, portfolio, and blog.

I am always open to new opportunities and challenges that can help me grow as a professional and as a person. Feel free to connect with me if you want to collaborate or chat about anything related to software development. ðŸ˜Š
